de.mrapp.apriori

Class Sorting<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.mrapp.apriori.Sorting<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - The type of the items, the sorting applies to
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.Comparator<T>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Sorting.AssociationRuleSorting, Sorting.ItemSetSorting

    public abstract class Sorting<T>
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.util.Comparator<T>
    A sorting, which specifies how item sets or association rules should be sorted.
    Since:
    1.2.0
